title: why pixel phones do not come with android one?
content:
in wikipedia page about pixel
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pixel_(smartphone)
is not said that it comes with android one, nor stock android
nor here https://www.android.com/one
the pixel phones are listed as having the android one

but here 
https://www.androidauthority.com/best-smartphones-stock-android-844672/
its listed as pixels are running stock android,
which acording to their article : https://www.androidauthority.com/what-is-stock-android-845627/
stock android is the same as android one

so, in reality, pixel phones run android one or stock android?

here
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Android_One
is said
##Android One is a near-stock version of the Android operating system released by Google##
but there is also said
##Android One cannot be altered by the companies that make the phones, and only runs on certain smartphones.##
but if the OS cannot be altered by company, then shouldn't it be a stocked version (that is, the OS has no retouches from the phone manufacturer)?

so, i am a bit confused, whats the difference between stock and one android?

thanks
